title: Document schema
description: This schema defines the class 'Document', which is used to describe any documents in the context of a service description. Examples of the Document instances include: policy document, protocol, etc.

document.description: Any medium with information recorded on or in it.

title.description: The name by which the document is formally known.

alternative-title.description: An alternative name for the document.

publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the document available.

date-issued.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the document.

version.description: The current version or revision level of the document.

creator.description: The entity primarily responsible for making the content of the document.

location.description: The address or Web location where a copy of the document can be obtained.
